title: Replace site logo with the provided existing logo image

requirements.text: Replace the current site logo asset used in the Header and Maintenance screen with the provided existing logo (uploaded image `012.jpeg`) by regenerating the logo file at the exact path currently referenced by the app.

quotes: that logo ko replace kar do existing se

acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/components/Header.tsx` and `frontend/src/components/MaintenanceScreen.tsx` continue to reference `/assets/generated/logo-finance-ki-sharan-transparent.dim_200x100.png` with no broken images.
The displayed logo in the header (height ~40px) and maintenance screen (height ~80px) visually matches the uploaded logo design from `012.jpeg`.
The generated logo has a clean, transparent background (or a background that blends seamlessly with both light and dark themes).

requirements.text: Update the site favicon to match the provided existing logo (uploaded image `012.jpeg`) by regenerating the favicon file at the exact path currently referenced by the app.

quotes: that logo ko replace kar do existing se

acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/index.html` continues to reference `/assets/generated/favicon-logo.dim_32x32.png` with no broken favicon.
Browser tab favicon visually matches the uploaded logo design from `012.jpeg` and remains legible at 32×32.

constraints: Do not change any files under `frontend/src/components/ui` or other immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Keep the app’s existing logo and favicon URL paths unchanged; update by replacing the underlying static assets so no routing/code refactor is required.
nonGoals: Creating a new brand identity, changing site name/tagline text, or redesigning the header layout.
Fixing admin routing / canister gateway issues (not part of this request).

required: Logo mark on transparent background, centered with comfortable padding (logo-finance-ki-sharan-transparent.dim_200x100.png)
Square favicon version derived from the logo, simplified/cropped for legibility (favicon-logo.dim_32x32.png)
